attributes.action: completely withdraw funding and participation from the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Second from last in 2007.  It is known internationally that Eurovision is purely a political tool and that due to the Iraq war and certain other countries general dislike of the UK, we will not win again for years.
Why should we bother? Our taxes pay for this either directly via central Gevernment or indirectly via the BBC licence fee.
Let all the new 'Europeans' pay.  Particularly Russia - when did they join Europe?

Please vote for this E-petition.
Thanks.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
